general_advisory: Rice: Drain out excess water from paddy field & regular surveillance work should be taken up in all crops. Increased difference between daily maximum and minimum temperature favours the infestation of blast. Sugarcane: Collect setts from the whole cane of a 6-8-month-old plant crop. Blackgram: To reduce incidence of Powdery mildew, Anthracnose & Stem rot spray recommended. Rapeseed & Mustard: Mustard/Toria crop is at the flowering to pod filling stage. Vegetables: Cucurbits - Spray Acephate to minimize damage caused by Red Pumpkin Bettle. Pisciculture: Small white rash appear on the body of fish are symptoms of white spot disease. Animal Science: Animals should be given mineral mixture along with salt regularly.

advisory: Drain out excess water from paddy field & regular surveillance work should be taken up in all crops.
Collect setts from the whole cane of a 6-8-month-old plant crop.
Sett Rot management after planting basal drenching with Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% @ 400-gram/acre.
To reduce incidence of Powdery mildew, Anthracnose & Stem rot in blackgram, spraying of recommended pesticides is advised.
The mustard/Toria crop is at the flowering to pod filling stage.
Spraying of Acephate along with neem oil formulation is recommended in Cucurbits to minimize damage caused by Red Pumpkin Bettle.
Small white rash appear on the body of fish are symptoms of white spot disease. Treat affected fish accordingly.
Animals should be given mineral mixture along with salt regularly to meet energy requirements.
